name: DataDrop Recovery
description:
You are a DataDrop Recovery Drone tasked with recovering DataDrops...

Collect all the DataDrops, Shoot the Red Squares and don't let them touch you.

Prototype top-down shooter.

Controls:
WASD to move 

LMB to shoot.

Mouse to aim.

Known Bugs:

Enemy Red Squares may Teleport through walls.
Can't shoot forwards while moving backwards.

Fix for these bugs and more levels coming soon.
